column3: Na kaansa mbepɔw tutu kogu po bun mu;"

column2: "Kaansa no mu nsu wor na ohur
column3: Kaansa n’asorɛkye na mbepɔw wosow mpo a
no nworaba ma Nyankopɔn kurow enyi gye
column4: Ɔsorsornyi no ne ntamadan bea krɔnkrɔn no."

column2: "Nyankopɔn wɔ ne finimfin; na orunntutu: Nyankopɔn bɔboa no anapahema."

column4: Na ɔbɔɔ ne ndze mu no

column3: Ɔsɛɛ kor a ɔama aba asaase do."

column2: "Ɔma akodzi bɔ adze kodu asaase ano; Obubu egyen mu
column3: na otwitwa mpeaa mu esinesin; Ɔhyew ntseaseanam wɔ ogya mu."
na hom nhu dɛ emi nye Nyankopɔn: Wobohuhor me wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Dɔm EWURADZE nye hɛn wɔ hɔ; Jakob Nyankopɔn yɛ hɛn abantsentsen."
